pr_title: [NCL-5891] add generalized way to update OneToMany relationships and add functionality to endpoints

timeline.message: [NCL-5891] fix PV.Builder to also update BuildConfiguration's side
[NCL-5891] add general method for updating owning side of relationships

timeline.bodyText:
This will break the TreeSet as if A != B  then A > B && A < B. (or in best case will be as efficient as array list)
You would want to use Map<ID, Entity> I think.

replies.bodyText: Yes, TreeSet will be inefficient, you are absolutely correct. Map with ID as a Key basically does exactly what I need. Thx for the suggestion.
